content: tulip is the sweetest little mouse who has a love for all things floral her favorite flower is of course her namesake when she isn t tending to her flowers you can find tulip having garden parties and hosting brunches for her fellow tiny animals tulip is approximately 10 inches from head to toe tulip is the perfect gift this pattern includes a photo tutorial and a written stitch guide i do recommend you know basic stitches before tackling this project also included are photo tutorials to help reference the written pattern please note that this pattern is for personal use only you may make as many items as you wish for yourself or as gifts you may sell the item that you make from this pattern but i ask that you please refer back to me as the designer please do not share reproduce or sell this pattern online or in print thank you for your support happy crocheting
